    "common": {

        "setting3 (  added  )": null,
        "setting4 (  added  )": "blah blah",
        "setting5 (  added  )": {
            "key5": "value5"
        },
        "setting6": {
            "doge": {
                "wow ( removed )": "",
                "wow (  added  )": "so much"
            },
            "key (unchanged)": "value",
            "ops (  added  )": "vops"
        }
    },

        "baz ( removed )": "bas",
        "baz (  added  )": "bars",
        "foo (unchanged)": "bar",
        "nest ( removed )": {
            "key": "value"
        },
        "nest (  added  )": "str"
    },

        "abc": 12345,

            "id": {
